TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A short piece of the ras protein, which is made by the ras gene. The ras gene has been found to cause cancer when it is mutated (changed).

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "péptido de ras"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Pedazo corto de la proteína de ras, que es elaborada por el gen ras. Se ha encontrado que el gen ras causa cáncer cuando muta (cambia).
